snippet.title: Noun Town VR Language Learning - Quest 2 & Steam VR Trailer
snippet.description:
Looking for one of the best Oculus Quest 2 games in 2023? Out now on Steam VR and the Meta Quest 2, Noun Town VR is the new way to learn a foreign language!

Get it on:
Quest 2: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5520452821357227/
Steam VR: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1643100?utm_source=youtube

----------------------------------------

▸From beginner to winner
Start from scratch and build up 1,000+ words and phrases in Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, French, German, and Italian.

▸No grinding, just gaming
Learn through playing on your Oculus Quest and Steam VR, in a world full of exciting mini-games and interactive lessons

▸Speak like a native
Interact with 16 unique characters using speech recognition to nail down tricky pronunciations, removing the anxiety of slipping up when you practice in real life.

In Noun Town your learning directly impacts the game environment, turning the island into color and unlocking new characters and gameplay modes.

----------------------------------------

More info:
▸ Noun Town virtual reality on Twitter: https://twitter.com/realiaXR
▸ Noun Town virtual reality website: https://noun.town

Mixed Reality Trailer created by ANABURN: https://www.youtube.com/c/ANABURN
